posts.post_title: For trade: Pfeister Pied 42 & Bescher Cycle 460
posts.post_content:
I have a Pfeister Pied Factory 42 and a Bescher Cycle 460 that I would like to trade for Cycle 460's that I need for my subset. 

Please contact me with any questions and trade offers.
